measured_by: two-alternative forced-choice visual / auditory / audiovisual discrimination task
justification: "Participants performed a two-alternatives forced-choice decision task … The task consisted of 600 trials … We calculated the average accuracies per participant for trials of different modalities and difficulties…"

measured_by: generalized linear mixed-effects modelling of time-varying stimulus evidence
justification: "To investigate the dynamics of sensory integration … we performed different generalized linear mixed-effects models (GLMs) for visual, auditory and audiovisual trials … This provided us with Beta coefficients … the coefficient value reflects the weight of the evidence."
